vernac_cmds: Lemma approx_derives_ge : forall n m P, (n <= m)%nat -> approx n P |-- approx m P.
intros; change (predicates_hered.derives (approx n P) (approx m P)).
Lemma approx_derives : forall P n, approx n P |-- P.
Program Definition weak_exclusive_mpred (P: mpred): mpred := fun w => exclusive_mpred (approx (S (level w)) P).
assert (forall y, (n >= level y)%nat -> (P y <-> Q y)).
match goal with |- ?P |-- ?Q => change (predicates_hered.derives P Q) end.

Definition lock_inv : share -> val -> mpred -> mpred := fun sh v R => (EX b : block, EX ofs : _, !!(v = Vptr b ofs) && LKspec LKSIZE R sh (b, Ptrofs.unsigned ofs))%logic.
Definition rec_inv sh v (Q R: mpred): Prop := (R = Q * |>lock_inv sh v R)%logic.
Definition weak_rec_inv sh v (Q R: mpred): mpred := (! (R <=> Q * |>lock_inv sh v R))%pred.
Lemma lockinv_isptr sh v R : lock_inv sh v R = (!! isptr v && lock_inv sh v R)%logic.
assert (D : isptr v \/ ~isptr v) by (destruct v; simpl; auto).
Lemma unfash_fash_equiv: forall P Q: mpred, (P <=> Q |-- (subtypes.unfash (subtypes.fash P): mpred) <=> (subtypes.unfash (subtypes.fash Q): mpred))%pred.
assert (forall y: rmap, (a >= level y)%nat -> (app_pred P y <-> app_pred Q y)).
Lemma iffp_equiv: forall P1 Q1 P2 Q2: mpred, ((P1 <=> Q1) && (P2 <=> Q2) |-- (P1 <--> P2) <=> (Q1 <--> Q2))%pred.
assert (forall y: rmap, (a >= level y)%nat -> (app_pred P1 y <-> app_pred Q1 y)).
assert (forall y: rmap, (a >= level y)%nat -> (app_pred P2 y <-> app_pred Q2 y)).
split; [destruct H5 as [? _] | destruct H5 as [_ ?]]; intros ? HH; specialize (H5 _ HH).
split; [destruct H5 as [? _] | destruct H5 as [_ ?]]; intros ? HH; specialize (H5 _ HH).
Lemma sepcon_equiv: forall P1 Q1 P2 Q2: mpred, ((P1 <=> Q1) && (P2 <=> Q2) |-- (P1 * P2) <=> (Q1 * Q2))%pred.
assert (forall y: rmap, (a >= level y)%nat -> (app_pred P1 y <-> app_pred Q1 y)).
assert (forall y: rmap, (a >= level y)%nat -> (app_pred P2 y <-> app_pred Q2 y)).
exists w1, w2; split; [| split]; auto.
exists w1, w2; split; [| split]; auto.
Lemma later_equiv: forall P Q: mpred, (P <=> Q |-- |> P <=> |> Q)%pred.
assert (forall y: rmap, (a >= level y)%nat -> (app_pred P y <-> app_pred Q y)).
split; hnf; intros; simpl in *; intros.
Lemma nonexpansive_lock_inv : forall sh p, nonexpansive (lock_inv sh p).
assert (forall y: rmap, (n >= level y)%nat -> (app_pred P y <-> app_pred Q y)).

Lemma rec_inv1_nonexpansive: forall sh v Q, nonexpansive (weak_rec_inv sh v Q).
Lemma rec_inv2_nonexpansive: forall sh v R, nonexpansive (fun Q => weak_rec_inv sh v Q R).
Lemma exclusive_weak_exclusive: forall R, exclusive_mpred R -> TT |-- weak_exclusive_mpred R.
Lemma rec_inv_weak_rec_inv: forall sh v Q R, rec_inv sh v Q R -> TT |-- weak_rec_inv sh v Q R.
change (predicates_hered.derives TT (weak_rec_inv sh v Q R)).
